title: Linux sdiff Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the sdiff command in Linux, a powerful tool for comparing and merging text files. Learn its syntax, practical examples, and how to customize the output for efficient text processing and editing.

meta.title: Linux sdiff Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the sdiff command in Linux, a powerful tool for comparing and merging text files. Learn its syntax, practical examples, and how to customize the output for efficient text processing and editing.
meta.keywords: sdiff, Linux, text processing, file comparison, file merging, text editing, command line
